snippet.title: Nightfall Terror : Trails of the Dead | Release Trailer
snippet.description:
You play as Detective Mason, an investigator determined to solve the chilling mystery of the disappearance of three teenagers, their last known location was in The Whispering Pines Forest. Will you find those poor kids or is it too late..

 
After 2 months, my first SERIOUS attempt at making a horror game is finally done, I hope you guys enjoy my horror game, and I hope i can make more games in the future.. 

Special thanks to @hoovyaj and my twin brother for playtesting the game for me :) 

Link to the Game
https://mansterpants.itch.io/nightfall-terror

https://gamejolt.com/games/Nightfallterror/913035
